description: This scholarship is awarded to a History or History Education major in honor of retired Professor of History, Dr. Russ Goodno. Eligibility Requirements History or Geography - General or History Education major Minimum 2.5 GPA overall 1-2 page essay describing financial need and academic potential Continuing student in the fall semester that the scholarship is awarded

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
